input.sentences: i went to the park one afternoon .
afterward i hung out at the pier .
some people were playing music there .
i was getting hungry so i left to find something to eat .
i went to a restaurant to eat .
output.sentences: a couple was taking a stroll in a nearby park, one afternoon
the stroll took them to a pier
it was by an area where there were games and music
They both were growing hungry, so they decided to go eat
they had a lovely afternoon lunch an outdoor eatery
